history.proof: intros a. qsimpl time: 1 use: multA_A1_l.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} eqA_trans := CoefStructure.eqA_trans A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.transitive A eqA eqA_sym := CoefStructure.eqA_sym A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.symmetric A eqA a : A The term "cs" has type "CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA" while it is expected to have type "Set".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
eqA_trans: Relation_Definitions.transitive A eqA
eqA_sym: Relation_Definitions.symmetric A eqA

Goal:
forall a : A, eqA (multA a A1) a

Premises:
Module Relation_Definitions := Struct Definition relation : Type -> Type. Definition reflexive : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop. Definition transitive : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop. Definition symmetric : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop. Definition antisymmetric : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop. Definition equiv : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop. Record preorder (A : Type) (R : relation A) : Prop := Build_preorder { preord_refl : reflexive A R; preord_trans : transitive A R } Definition preord_refl : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), preorder A R -> reflexive A R. Definition preord_trans : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), preorder A R -> transitive A R. Record order (A : Type) (R : relation A) : Prop := Build_order { ord_refl : reflexive
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
Relation_Definitions.transitive : forall A : Type, Relation_Definitions.relation A -> Prop
Relation_Definitions.symmetric : forall A : Type, Relation_Definitions.relation A -> Prop
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} eqA_trans := CoefStructure.eqA_trans A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.transitive A eqA eqA_sym := CoefStructure.eqA_sym A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.symmetric A eqA |- Prop]
ssrbool.is_left : {?A} + {?B} -> bool where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} eqA_trans := CoefStructure.eqA_trans A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.transitive A eqA eqA_sym := CoefStructure.eqA_sym A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.symmetric A eqA |- Prop]
inleft : ?A -> ?A + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} eqA_trans := CoefStructure.eqA_trans A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.transitive A eqA eqA_sym := CoefStructure.eqA_sym A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.symmetric A eqA |- Prop]
right : ?B -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} eqA_trans := CoefStructure.eqA_trans A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.transitive A eqA eqA_sym := CoefStructure.eqA_sym A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.symmetric A eqA |- Prop]
inright : ?B -> ?A + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} eqA_trans := CoefStructure.eqA_trans A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.transitive A eqA eqA_sym := CoefStructure.eqA_sym A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.symmetric A eqA |- Prop]
Fin.eqb : Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t ?n -> bool where ?m : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} eqA_trans := CoefStructure.eqA_trans A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.transitive A eqA eqA_sym := CoefStructure.eqA_sym A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.symmetric A eqA |- nat]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} eqA_trans := CoefStructure.eqA_trans A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.transitive A eqA eqA_sym := CoefStructure.eqA_sym A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.symmetric A eqA |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} eqA_trans := CoefStructure.eqA_trans A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.transitive A eqA eqA_sym := CoefStructure.eqA_sym A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.symmetric A eqA |- Type]
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : Fin.t ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A ->...-> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} eqA_trans := CoefStructure.eqA_trans A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.transitive A eqA eqA_sym := CoefStructure.eqA_sym A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.symmetric A eqA |- nat]
multA_assoc : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 : A, eqA (multA a (multA b c0)) (multA (multA a b) c0)
multA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 d : A, eqA a c0 -> eqA b d -> eqA (multA a b) (multA c0 d)
multA_com : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) (multA b a)
multA_A1_l : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a : A, eqA (multA A1 a) a
plusA_A0 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a : A, eqA a (plusA a A0)
divA_is_multA : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b : A) (nZb : ~ eqA b A0), eqA a (multA (divA a b nZb) b)
plusA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 d : A, eqA a c0 -> eqA b d -> eqA (plusA a b) (plusA c0 d)
multA_dist_l : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 : A, eqA (plusA (multA c0 a) (multA c0 b)) (multA c0 (plusA a b))
minusA_def : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, eqA (minusA a b) (plusA a (invA b))
invA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, eqA a b -> eqA (invA a) (invA b)
multA_A0_l : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a : A, eqA (multA A0 a) A0
mkCoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), ~ eqA A1 A0 -> Relation_Definitions.reflexive A eqA -> Relation_Definitions.symmetric A eqA -> Relation_Definitions.transitive A eqA -> (forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA a (plusA b c)) (plusA (plusA a b) c)) -> (forall a b : A, eqA (plusA a b) (plusA b a)) ->...-> CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
plusA_assoc : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 : A, eqA (plusA a (plusA b c0)) (plusA (plusA a b) c0)
invA_plusA : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a : A, eqA A0 (plusA a (invA a))
plusA_com : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, eqA (plusA a b) (plusA b a)
divA_multA_comp_r : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b c0 : A) (nZc : ~ eqA c0 A0), eqA (divA (multA a b) c0 nZc) (multA (divA a c0 nZc) b)

```coq
intros a.
rewrite <- (multA_A1_l cs a).
rewrite <- (multA_com cs A1 a).
apply multA_A1_l.
Qed.
```

original: intros a. rewrite <- (multA_A1_l cs a). rewrite <- (multA_com cs A1 a). apply multA_A1_l.
